title: Tesla Will Hike Model 3 And Model Y Prices in November - But No One Knows By How Much
description: Tesla's website provides a vague message if you go to look at a Model 3 or a Model Y: "Price Increases in November." The website does not provide other information, and no information was given in the form of a press release. Tesla also does not have a PR department to contact for comment, which ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Sets Stage for Price Jumps on Model 3 and Y in November"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's website now features a straightforward notification for the Model 3 and Model Y: price increases took effect in November. The company hasn't issued a formal announcement or provided additional details about these changes.

title: Toyota Built a Lifted Corolla Cross Hybrid Nobody Asked For
description: The term "soft-roader" wasn't exactly a compliment. Crossovers were often discarded as family vehicles pretending to be rugged. However, the advent of adventure-inspired trims and off-road accessory packages proves that not every trail-worthy vehicle needs to be a full-blown SUV. The Toyota Corolla ...
titleSummary: Toyota Unleashes Unapologetic Off-Road Beast Based on Humble Corolla Hybrid Platform
descriptionSummary: Crossover stigma has faded with the rise of adventure-focused trims and off-road accessories, making it possible for vehicles like the Toyota Corolla to blend comfort and capability in a more nuanced way than traditional SUVs.

title: Infiniti Teases a QX80 Like We've Never Seen Before
description: After nearly two decades in service, the Nissan GT-R R35 has retired, officially ending production and marking the countdown to the next-generation Godzilla. However, Nissan isn't ready to forego Godzilla's legacy just yet. After dressing up the Nissan Z with the GT-R's iconic Midnight Purple, the ...
titleSummary: "Infiniti Unveils a Futuristic QX80 Concept that Redefines Luxury SUV Design"
descriptionSummary: The curtain closes on a two-decade chapter as the Nissan GT-R R35 departs from production lines, paving the way for its successor. But before saying goodbye, Nissan gave a parting gift: wrapping the Nissan Z in the legendary GT-R's signature Midnight Purple hue.

title: The Last Ford F-150 Lightning For Under $50k Is Dead
description: Following the scrapping of the EV tax credit at the end of September, there was some good news for the 2026 Ford F-150 Lightning. titleSummary: "Ford F-150 Lightning Price Hike Cuts Off Last Chance at Affordable Deal"
descriptionSummary: With the federal EV tax credit expiration no longer a factor, the 2026 Ford F-150 Lightning is poised for a price cut of up to $4,000 on select trims when it hits the market. One key detail remains under wraps: pricing for the entry-level Pro model.

title: First Look: All-New 2027 Kia Telluride Teased Ahead of Full Reveal
description: The Telluride is one of Kia’s most important models in the United States. Designed specifically for this market, it has won numerous awards and consistently achieved high sales since going into production in 2019. Now that Hyundai has revealed a new Palisade—which shares a platform with the ...
titleSummary: "Kia Unveils Glimpse of Next-Gen Telluride SUV Before Official Debut Revealed"

title: Subaru Drops Enticing 2025 Outback Lease Deal For October
description: Subaru revealed a completely new Outback for the 2026 model year back in August, and it’s less wagon and more rugged SUV than before. descriptionSummary: Subaru's revamped Outback for 2026 marked a significant departure from its utilitarian roots, embracing a more rugged SUV profile at the expense of value-driven affordability. A hefty price tag now deters enthusiasts seeking a straightforward, no-frills experience.

title: Alfa Romeo Is Desperately Reviving The Quadrifoglio V6 To Keep The Aging Giulia And Stelvio Alive
description: The current-generation (Type 952) Alfa Romeo Giulia was unveiled a decade ago in June 2015, and the Stelvio (Type 949) arrived around the same time, so they're both a little long in the tooth. descriptionSummary: The Alfa Romeo Giulia and its sibling model, the Stelvio, have been stalwarts of the brand's lineup since their introduction nearly a decade ago. However, they're set to continue serving through at least 2027, with updates planned along the way.

title: Nissan Drops Killer 2026 Rogue Lease Deal For October
description: While it can’t match the Toyota RAV4 on the sales charts, the Nissan Rogue is still one of the most popular compact crossovers in the United States. title: Jaguar's Polarizing EV Looks Like A Fish Out Of Water On The Nürburgring
description: Pretty much everybody has an opinion on Jaguar's recent rebrand and the upcoming Type 00 that spearheads the revolution, and although many of those opinions have been negative, the British automaker is pushing ahead, now taking the car to the Nürburgring to continue development of the powertrain ...

descriptionSummary: Jaguar is unwavering in its vision for a new era, despite mixed reactions to its rebrand and flagship Type 00 model. The company is taking the vehicle back to the Nürburgring to refine its powerful engine.

title: Tesla Quietly Removes Key Cards From New Cars — and Owners Aren’t Happy
description: When you buy a new Tesla, you get a little credit-card-sized device that acts as a key for the car. Of course, the automaker also offers a mobile app for locking and unlocking (you still need to open the doors with those hands of yours). However, Tesla appears to have removed mention of the key ...

descriptionSummary: When you purchase a new Tesla, you receive a compact key card, but traditional keys and a mobile app for remote access are also provided. The card serves as an alternative entry method for added convenience.

title: Ultra-Fast EV Charging Is Coming to the U.S. Next Year, But Do We Really Need It?

descriptionSummary: Car enthusiasts and everyday drivers often wonder why manufacturers discontinue seemingly popular models, but such decisions are complex and multifaceted, driven by factors like sluggish sales, shifting consumer tastes, and strategic brand realignments.

title: Why a Parking Tap Now Costs $8,500—and It's Only Getting Worse

title: The Hidden Reason Your Car Repair Bill Keeps Getting Bigger in 2025
description: America ran out of wrench-turners just as cars became rolling computers.
